**XSS (Cross-Site Scripting) Prevention:**
- **CRITICAL**: Flag unescaped user input rendered in HTML/JSX
- Verify proper input sanitization before rendering
- Check for XSS vulnerabilities in dynamic content rendering
- Flag use of dangerouslySetInnerHTML without sanitization
- Verify proper input encoding/escaping for HTML, JavaScript, and URL contexts
- Check for reflected XSS in URL parameters or form inputs
